pages.text: This passive creatures can be found in the Maple Forest. You can attract them using Red or Brown Mushrooms.$(br2)If you give a Red or Brown Mushroom to a Snail, it will place on the ground a Sail Slime. If you broke it you will get a Snail Slime.$(br2)This can be used to make Snail Slime Block or to create a $(l:patchouli:potions/extension)Potion of Extension$(/l).
Snails are a little shy, when we are close to them, they will hide under their shells, gaining +20 resistance.

We can bred Snails give them Mushroom Stews. $(br2)When they grows to Adults Snailts, they drop Snail Shell Piece.$(br2)We can use them to craft new blocks like Snail Shell Tiles, Snail Shell Blocks or Snail Shell Bricks.$(br2)We can craft a Snail Banner Pattern with them.$(br2)Finally we can make a $(l:patchouli:armors/snail_chestplate)Snail Shell Chestplate$$(/l).
